=== Notes ===
Everything works out of the box with Ubuntu 9.10. To get 3D effects Nvidia proprietary driver is needed which works through "Ubuntu hardware drivers".
Suspend works fine, however hibernation doesn't. Hardware function keys and infra-red works fine, including remote control.
